Articles.Content: Just started playing this the other week and I am loving it. Spent the last 2 days trying to send ships to the Mun to collect science with enough fuel to get back but sadly they ran out of fuel, but I was able to after 2 more days send a ship there with a Hitch Hiker attachment there to rescue Jeb and collect all the missing science! I was so happy when it remade Kerbin orbit! No I am working on my docking but am having some troubles, but that is where I find the fun to be. Anyway I am going to go and try my attempt at more docking. Have fun and fly safe!
Hello MrArsenic. Congratulations on your rescue mission, and welcome to the forum.

Hi, welcome to the forums!

Congrats on rescuing Jeb and making it back to Kerbin safely!
Thanks guy, and that was a fun rescue mission.
